physical_examinations.relevant_findings: GEN: NAD, well appearing; HEENT: NCAT; CV: RRR, radial pulses 2+ b/l; RESP: breathing comfortably on room air; GI: midline laparotomy site C/D/I with staples appropriately in place, LLQ Colostomy bag with healthy appearing pink colonic mucosa within, no surrounding erythema or purulence, soft, non-distended, no guarding, rebound, masses or hernias on palpation; EXT: well perfused.
